title: When you have a Zilean bomb on you & you're around a bunch of low health teammates.

replies.body: Even better, when it's on you and they run towards you like idiots.
"Quick, guys, we gotta work together to defuse it!"
PENTAKILL! {{champion:26}}

Reaction when you purposefully blow them up. :3

https://media.giphy.com/media/4UJyRK2TXNhgk/giphy.gif
"Some days you just can't get rid of a bomb."
Dang it, beat me to it.
Same!
https://tomscifiblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/05/tumblr_m7vhjugwae1qhejigo1_500.gif?w=484&h=258
The best part is how no one but Batman seems concerned over what is clearly recognizable as a cartoon style bomb.
Have you seen that TV series? Cartoon bombs are pretty tame compared to the other craziness that happens.

Yes, I have. I also remember seeing Roddy McDowell as the Bookworm try to kill Batman and Robin by setting up a giant book made out of metal that was supposed to steam roast them to death, but they escaped into the sewer the book was taking the steam from. And then there was the episode where Robin was almost eaten by a GIANT CLAM.... The worst thing absolutely has to be King Tut. Normal archeologist until he gets hit on the head, then he thinks he's Tut reincarnated and somehow gathers a group of criminals willing to steal things for him and set up an Egyptian themed lair.

Let's not forget the Joker's master plan of stealing some surfer's surfitude and then...

Wait, was that the entire plan?

> [{quoted}](name=revliledpembroke,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=pxFv2HgE,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-12-06T12:02:19.877+0000)
>
> The best part is how no one but Batman seems concerned over what is clearly recognizable as a cartoon style bomb.

Yep.

You take advantage of the League of Mobility and dash into your teammates :3

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
If I had an RP for every time an enemy did that, I'd probably have a Zilean skin by now.
That happens a lot in ARAM and I'm usually that guy  with the bomb
{{champion:18}}+{{champion:26}}+{{champion:14}}= Ultimate fadeaway bomb squad.

When Tahm Kench first came out, my first game qued, I saw a Zilean-Tahm bot lane. 


Shit got real.
omg that made me laugh out loud so fucking hard AHAHAHAHAHAH
Make sure to give it some Space AIDS from {{champion:90}} too.
Good addition, assuming they survive the initial nukes
throw a syndra in there too, just to make sure
and Karthus ISN'T around to ult? What madness is this?!?
same applies to a tristana e.

> [{quoted}](name=Teemo or Feedmo,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=pxFv2HgE,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-12-06T14:22:37.230+0000)
>
> same applies to a tristana e.

Heh, imagine playing against a Trist, Zil, Lulu, Illaoi and Malz and being that one guy that keeps getting your team aced by running straight into them with all debuffs on you.
Actually, my favorite there was when the enemy ran towards their low health tower and blew it up :)
Or when you Kog'Maw and about to get a triple kill when you passive. "ALAH AKBAR!"

> [{quoted}](name=ZGM Dazzling,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=pxFv2HgE,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2015-12-07T01:03:54.795+0000)
>

And one theist because you're a bigot.
Great One. I even love the summoner name
That gif is just way too good omfg
When it's full AP Zilean and two bombs delete the adc. ._.

Then Proceed to be headbutted into your allies by full AP Alister giving Zillian the Penta-Kill
